title: Apple’s next big thing might be healthcare
description: Apple’s next big push may be around health insurance, according to Ben Wood, analyst at CCS Insight. I think his idea makes sense, given all the work Apple already does in the space  — and it

title: For IT, showing you’re productive matters now more than ever
description:
The pandemic and its associated shift to remote work presented a challenge for IT, and prompted organizations of all types to turn to productivity and performance tracking to keep tabs on workers, whether remote or in the office.

The goal is simple: use these new tools to ensure workers are, in fact, working. This can involve si

title: Microsoft rolls out first 'moment' update for Windows 11; Win 10 22H2 now available
description: Microsoft on Tuesday announced its first “moment” update for Windows 11, one of the periodic updates the company signaled last month
